Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

APIs.json

    Where the Dollar Comes From and Goes To

    This dataset shows where the dollar comes from and goes to in the budget. Data is reported in dollars and updated annually.

    Weights, Measures, and Other Tests

    This dataset features detailed information about DCA inspections of scales, measuring devices, pricing, and other equipment.

    Water Consumption In The New York City

    A brief history of water consumption in the New York City Water Supply System (Based on New York City Census population)

    Water Consumption And Cost (2013 - 2020)

    Monthly consumption and cost data by borough and development. Data set includes utility vendor and meter information.

    Water Consumption And Cost (2013 - 2020)

    Monthly consumption and cost data by borough and development. Data set includes utility vendor and meter information.

    Water and Sewer Permits

    The DEP Application and Permit data will contain information about the different types of applications approved and permits issued on a regular basis.

    WalkNYC Sign Locations

    Dataset containing points representing WalkNYC sign locations throughout New York City.
